description: This file defines the 'Note' entity class used in the application, annotated for use with Room persistence library. It models a note with attributes including title, content, creation and update timestamps, and an auto-generated primary key.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A model class representing a note entity with fields for id, title, content, creation timestamp, and update timestamp.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Constructor for creating a new Note instance with specified title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt timestamps.
